author: nicolaken
msg: Make tigris-style use a xslt-generated css so it can have color
profiles. Will do this step later.

author: nicolaken
msg: Start making the krysalis skin css be generated via xslt.
Will be adding color profiles later.

author: nicolaken
msg: Now skin resources can be generated from skinconf.xml from xslt.
For example /myskin/css/my.css.xslt is used by forrest on skinconf.xml

author: nicolaken
msg: Make the alt attribute more cute and functional when the images are not present.

author: nicolaken
msg: It's now possible to have two levels of tabs.
External links are now identified by a small trailing icon.
The icon can be overridden by the skin and the behaviour
